description: This file defines an authentication context for a React application, including functions to manage user authentication state, fetch user info, handle login/logout operations, and provide authentication-related data through React context.

methods.name: rolesFromMe
methods.description: Extracts roles array from the 'me' API response.

methods.name: tenantsFromMe
methods.description: Extracts tenants array from the 'me' API response.

methods.name: userFromMe
methods.description: Constructs a User object from the 'me' response or returns null if unavailable.
